# 【手把手带你Godot游戏开发 第一弹】零基础入门案例：FlappyBird

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird
shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird
shoubashou-dai-ni-godot-youxi-kaifa-diyi-dan-ling-jichu-rumen-anli-flappybird <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
